DOC.detailed_description: This Investigator-initiated , prospective , open-label , randomize , adaptive design study enroll 30 adult renal transplant recipient biopsy-confirmed AMR within 30 day post transplantation . After informed consent obtain study eligibility confirm , subject enrol immediately biopsy confirmation AMR positive donor specific antibody ( DSA ) . Subjects randomized one two treatment group ( SOC [ control ] rhC1INH ) . An initial cohort 8 subject ( 3 SOC , 5 rhC1INH ) receive intensive safety monitor coagulation system thromboembolic event .
